code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./login.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/login"),{username,password});if(res.data&&res.data.user){localStorage.setItem("token",res.data.token||"dummy-token");localStorage.setItem("manager",JSON.stringify(res.data.user));navigate("/users");}else{alert("Hatalı kullanıcı adı veya şifre.");}}catch(err){console.error("Login Error:",err);alert("Kullanıcı Adı Veya Şifre Hatalı!");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"login-title",children:"Giri\u015F Yap"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"form-control mb-2",placeholder:"Kullan\u0131c\u0131 Ad\u0131",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"form-control mb-3",type:"password",placeholder:"\u015Eifre",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger w-100",children:"Giri\u015F"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mt-3 text-center",children:["\xDCye de\u011Fil misiniz? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/register",children:"Kay\u0131t Ol"})]})]})});}export default Login;
